gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 126, Raptors 120
gameRecap.excerpt: The Clippers defeated the Raptors, 126-120. Paul George led the Clippers with 29 points, seven rebounds, and six assists as Kawhi Leonard added 29 points and seven assists. Immanuel Quickley (25 points, four rebounds, six assists) and RJ Barrett (24 points, five rebounds, four assists) led the Raptors in defeat.
